tertiary.title: University of Edinburgh
bulletPoints: I graduated with First Class Honours while sitting for Masters of Engineering. Upon graduation I placed third in my year.

aboutSite.title: About this site
paragraph: The site has been created to showcase my current skill set. Hopefully, this is conveyed from an end-user‚Äôs perspective and through the underlying source code üî¨.

This site is built with React ‚öõÔ∏è and Gatsby üçæ. Gatsby is a React-based static site generator, leveraging pre-configuration to build a website that uses only static files. This alongside code splitting, intelligent image loading and asset optimisation lead to incredibly fast page loading times.

I have structured a React component 'Atomic Hierarchy' to aid abstraction and reuse throughout the application. In the future this Component Library may be published in a open-source NPM repository to be a dependency in further projects.
Please see links to the source code in the footer below, and feel free to drop me a message on LinkedIn if you would like to chat.
